summary: The State Department has expressed a commitment to building a workforce that reflects the diverse composition of the United States. We testified on State’s progress. Though State's workforce has grown more diverse, racial or ethnic minorities are still underrepresented, especially in the senior ranks. Racial or ethnic minorities in State’s Civil Service were 4% to 29% less likely to be promoted than their white coworkers...
title: State Department: Additional Steps Are Needed to Identify Barriers to Workforce Diversity
